Bree Cohen

Director of Recruitment

LinkedIn

Creative and resourceful talent acquisition partner with full life cycle recruiting experience in executive & inbound recruiting. Exceptional at identifying and hiring passive talent from entry-level to executive level across the United States.

6+ years of diversified human resources experience including employee relations and conflict management, onboarding/new hire development, benefits administration, payroll, and policy and procedure creation.

Passionate about the importance of company culture to the employee experience.
